sentences.en: As the equipment was unpacked, I led Lee around the overgrown garden.
sentences.cn: 取出设备后，我带着李在花草蔓生的花园里转了一圈。

sentences.en: Dr Lee believes that men who exercise can halve their risk of cancer of the colon.
sentences.cn: 李医生相信，锻炼身体能使患结肠癌的风险降低一半。

sentences.en: I'm sorry, but Miss Lee is resting and can't be disturbed.
sentences.cn: 抱歉，李小姐正在休息，不能打扰。

sentences.en: Lee and I fell in a tangled heap.
sentences.cn: 李和我扭作一团，摔倒在地。

sentences.en: Lee had to fight hard for his place on the expedition.
sentences.cn: 李不得不为在考察队中获得一席之地而苦苦争取。

sentences.en: Lee has divided his time between flat-hunting and travelling.
sentences.cn: 李平时不是在找公寓，就是在旅行。

sentences.en: Lee looked at Theodora. She stared back.
sentences.cn: 李看着西奥多拉，她也回视着他。

sentences.en: Lee tried to hide his excitement.
sentences.cn: 李试图掩饰自己的激动心情。

sentences.en: Lee was ill so I went instead.

sentences.en: Police said they had been unable to serve a summons on 25-year-old Lee Jones.
sentences.cn: 警方说他们无法传唤25岁的李·琼斯。

sentences.en: The book is inscribed: To John Arlott from Laurie Lee.
sentences.cn: 书的题赠是：献给约翰·阿洛特——劳丽·李。

sentences.en: The sea started to ease as we came under Cuba's lee.
sentences.cn: 我们靠近古巴的背风海岸时风浪开始平息。

sentences.cn: 我们坐在高树篱背风的一侧。

sentences.en: We took refuge in the lee of the wall.
sentences.cn: 我们在墙的背风处暂避.
